subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Cadel Evans, bidding for a revival after struggling since winning the 2011 Tour de France, has gone against convention and decided to race in May’s Giro d’Italia.
snippet: Cadel Evans, bidding for a revival after struggling since winning the 2011 Tour de France, has gone against convention and decided to race in May’s Giro d’Italia.
